formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen: Action: ListCategories Synopsis: List categories in configuration file Privilege: config,all Description: A 'ListCategories' action will dump the categories in a given file. Variables: Filename: Configuration filename (e.g. foo.conf)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
